description:
While Shuri and Reishiro are enjoying their vacation in Hawaii, Tomoharu discovers part of the statue he received at Kirie`s party is actually an Asura Machina plug-in. Wanting to avoid another catastrophe, Tomoharu follows Shuri`s advice and takes the mysterious plug-in to Toru, president of the Science Club. Kanade makes Tomoharu promise her that he won`t use his Asura Machina`s powers again. Still wanting to free the burial doll from the Asura Machina, Kagakagari comes after the igniter.
Source: crunchyroll
